EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2021-05-25-HHS-Beam-Healthcare.05-25-follow-up-non-attendee
EmailTemplate.subject: We missed you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: SORRY YOU MISSED IT Access the webinar recording below We are sorry you could not make it to our recent webinar! Access the recording below to review how telehealth can address needs specific to operating in a rural environment, especially physician staffing shortages and an aging population. For more information on extending care through a telemedicine hospitalist program, read our Beam Healthcare case study <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/case-study/extending-care-through-a-telemedicine-hospitalist-program/?utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=email&utm_content=hhs&utm_campaign=beam-healthcare-post-webinar-follow-up]]> About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. Unsubscribe <[[https://go1.teladochealth.com/subscriptions.html]]> | Privacy <[[https://teladochealth.com/privacy-policy/]]> | Legal Notice <[[https://teladochealth.com/notice-of-non-discrimination/]]> © 2021 Teladoc Health, Inc.
